[Home](./index.md) &gt; [anguyen-search-core-testt](./anguyen-search-core-testt.md) &gt; [DirectAnswer](./anguyen-search-core-testt.directanswer.md) &gt; [value](./anguyen-search-core-testt.directanswer.value.md)

## DirectAnswer.value property

The value of the direct answer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
value?: T;
```

## Remarks

A value will not be present if the [DirectAnswer.type](./anguyen-search-core-testt.directanswer.type.md) is 'FEATURED\_SNIPPET' and [DirectAnswer.fieldType](./anguyen-search-core-testt.directanswer.fieldtype.md) is 'rich\_text', 'markdown', 'html' or 'rich\_text\_v2'.
